task.summary: Default task

it seems that the Circe implicits can be now found by the ajax query launcher function for the View query
next step: create a sensible .onComplete method
plan for what needs to be done next is now written as TODO-s
removed some unnecessary imports
jo nagy refaktoralgatas utan a dolgokat ugyan annyira nem mukodnek, mint elotte....

ugy tunik, hogy egy nagyon egyszeru View Cache most mar muxik
a Thievery szamok osszaadasa-ra
a kess map-ja az egyelore meg csak egy Option :)
creating some infra for client side state representation (not readable by server side)
client state containing map has been written
client state containing map has been written

some basic CacheInterface is now "ready"
next step: implement adding thievery numbers in the React clien

some basic CacheInterface is now "ready"
next step: implement adding thievery numbers in the React clien
commenting out lot of model code
removing "old" code

now we need to figure out a way to re-render the child of the CacheInjectorHOC
maybe by setting a state of of the `CacheInjectorHOC` whenever a re-render is needed and then at the same time setting a new CacheInterface
maybe the `CacheInjectorHOC` could have a state of "Int"
and whenever that is incremented the `CacheInjectorHOC` sets the prop of the child to "something", say, to a new `CacheInterface`
every time the CacheInjectorHOC gets mounted, it sets the re-render-triggerer
so setting the re-render-triggerer is not the responsibility of `CacheInjectorHOC`'s child but of the `CacheInjectorHOC` itsel

Cleaning up code.

Cleaning up the code some more.
Introducing wrapper classes for making AJAX View requests more "explicit" / "type-safe", especially in the client methods, such as "getViewFromServer" and alike. So that the types tell what the data means.

Introducing wrapper classes for making AJAX View requests more "explicit" / "type-safe", especially in the client methods, such as "getViewFromServer" and alike. So that the types tell what the data means.
----------------------------------------------------------- Monday, 22 July 2019 3.54.32 :
Incorporating these wrapper classes into the functions in `object REST_ForView`, now those functions seem to compile. -----------------------------------------------------------
Monday, 22 July 2019 4.01.52 :
Adding some multi line TODO comment.
-----------------------------------------------------------
Monday, 22 July 2019 16.33.47 :
Getting rid of some type errors. Code still does not compile. Still going towards the "right" View cache implementation, instead of the one where the " `Map[ , ]` `" was just a simple dummy `Option[ ]``.
------------------------------------------------------------
Monday, 22 July 2019 23.45.57 :
The code compiles now, but it does not "work": we should replace calls to this: `app.client.ui.caching.viewCache.SumIntViewCache#getSumIntView` with this : `app.client.ui.caching.CacheInterface#readView` .
The first one does not work anymore and the second one is not implemented yet.
------------------------------------------------------------

Code compiles, now working on : `app.client.ui.caching.viewCache.ViewCache#getViewCacheState` to be like `readEntity` in `EntityCache`.
